price: Dan berkata orang-orang yang diberi ilmu pengetahuan dan keimanan (kepada orang-orang yang kafir), "Sesungguhnya kamu telah berdiam (dalam kubur) menurut ketetapan Allah sampai hari berbangkit; maka inilah hari berbangkit itu, akan tetapi kamu selalu tidak meyakini(nya)".
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ لَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡبَعۡثِۖ فَهَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡبَعۡثِ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wal-īmāna laqad labith'tum fī kitābi al-lahi ilā yawmi al-baʿthi fahādhā yawmu al-baʿthi walākinnakum kuntum lā taʿlamūna
